entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
